title: OS EXPERIENTIAL LEARNING COURSE
content: Seniors, Anyone have handwritten notes for this OS experiential learning course? The course name is  **Introduction to Linux** (edx platform). If yes pls share. Any tips how to prepare for this OS quiz?

comments.body: We had the Linux course on the Linux foundation website. Ig urs is something different
It's the course by the Linux foundation, just on the learning.edx website. If you have notes please share
I don't think we had a quiz lol.
Nobody took that course seriously so ur not gonna find anyone with notes

Why do you want notes? For us there was nothing beyond a quiz on the website. Even the quiz was extremely easy and could be easily googled. 

Do you guys have to do something else?
